products.name: Overdraft
products.shortDescription: An overdraft is a flexible revolving credit facility linked to your current account that gives you access to extra money.
products.specialFeature: To apply, click Select below, or visit any Nedbank, or call us on 0800 555 111 (toll-free)
salesHighlights: Since an overdraft is linked to your transactional current account, there is no need to open a separate account.
The additional funds are available once your account balance reaches zero.
The overdraft amount is available, whether you use it or not, and you can use all or only a portion of it.
Interest is charged only on the portion of the overdraft you have used.
You will get a personalised interest rate on your overdraft.
You can choose to take out overdraft insurance, which ensures that you have peace of mind in the event of your death, disablement or retrenchment.

eligibilityRules.description: You must earn a monthly salary of:
1#R6 000 if you have an active Nedbank current account; or
1#R7 000 if you don’t have a Nedbank current account, we will open a new account for you.
A valid SA Bar-coded Identity card/document
Three months bank statements (if non-Nedbank client)
You will also need to have a current account with us - either an existing account or we can open one for you when you apply for an overdraft.

salesHighlights: Option to link to the Greenbacks rewards programme
Complimentary card delivery through face-to-face or at a branch
Zero fees on card swipes
Mandatory automatic payment orders (APOs)

Rewards: Greenbacks Rewards is easy to understand and easy to use. Nedbank Greenbacks members earn Greenbacks on all eligible spend*. You earn unlimited Greenbacks 2X faster with the Greenbacks American Express® Credit Card and there are no expiration dates, caps or tiers.

You will earn accelerated Greenbacks with the Greenbacks American Express® credit card - 4 Greenbacks for every R10 eligible spend and 2 Greenbacks for every R10 eligible spend on the Nedbank MasterCard credit card.

You get to decide how you spend your rewards! Choose to Shop Invest or Donate your rewards. You can also spend your Greenbacks like cash with a FREE Nedbank Greenbacks SHOP Card, withdraw your Greenbacks as cash from any ATM or use your SHOP CARD internationally. The choice is entirely yours.
Affinities: Through the Greenbacks Rewards Program you can choose to support the development of the arts, the preservation and conservation of the environment, sports development or help orphaned and vulnerable children.
Green Affinity - Helping you support the environment at no cost to you
Children's Affinity - Helping the needy children of South Africa at no cost to you
Sport Affinity - Make sport development happen at no cost to you
Insurance: Optional mandate travel insurance cover available
Balance Transfer: The balance transfer option enables you to transfer credit card debt held at another financial institution onto your Nedbank credit card helping you lower the cost of your credit card borrowings and consolidating multiple credit card debts.
You get a preferential interest rate 11.9% over 12 months meaning you save on interest and pay a lower instalment for the balance transfer period.
You can organise your finances by consolidating multiple monthly payments into one.
You can transfer an amount that’s within the credit limit on your new card.
If you choose to close your other credit cards you can also save on fees.

products.name: The Platinum Card®
products.shortDescription: American Express - the trusted travel and shopping companion that allows you to explore a world of opportunities with a South African credit card while experiencing the safety and service that come with a globally respected brand.
salesHighlights: Enjoy privilege and prestige with the American Express® Platinum Card that offers a variety of exclusive features and added benefits.

Receive either a complimentary appetizer, 20% discount on food bills or a complimentary bottle of wine when paying your American Express Gold Card at participating restaurant. Click here for more info (link to https://www.americanexpress.com/uk/network/dining/)
Discounted fares on multiple airlines including Emirates, Etihad and Qatar Airways.
Complimentary access to over 1 000 airport lounges worldwide.
Exclusive Travel deals such as discounted flights and travel packages brought to you by American Express Travel.
Your dedicated Platinum Concierge service to take care of your travel and lifestyle plans, dinner reservations and tickets to sold out shows.
Complimentary membership to the Avis Presidents Club and the Hertz Gold Plus Rewards Programme.
Extra value worldwide across various Hotel Programmes including Fine Hotels and Resorts and The Hotel Collection.
Automatic enrolment to the Membership Reward™ Programme where you will earn 1,5 MR points for every R5 of eligible spend*
valueAddedServices: You can also pay your balance over time. You can choose how much to pay; just pay in full, the minimum amount due, or anything in between - it's that simple.
Enjoy remarkable basic worldwide protection for you, your partner, your children and your Supplementary Cardmembers which includes up to R10 million cover.
Optional Comprehensive Top Cover is also available on all travel.
Being a Platinum Cardmember entitles you to invitations to customised or exclusive events.
Your American Express® Platinum Card entitles you to one complimentary Platinum Supplementary and four complimentary Gold Supplementary Cards!

Hotel Programmes- Platinum brings you ex: Fine Hotels and Resorts - get access to over 900 hand-selected, iconic five-star properties worldwide.
The Hotel Collection - enjoy credits at more than 400 hotels in over 30 countries, including Hilton, Intercontinental and Mariott Hotels.
The Vacation Collection - when you book two nights or more at most of our hotels, you can also receive a complimentary dining experience, spa treatment, resort credit offer or complimentary nights.
Enjoy complimentary membership to the elite Preferred Golf programme, which boasts over 50 world-renowned golf resorts.
Enhanced Car Rental: Complimentary membership to Avis Preferred Plus where you will receive a free additional driver; guaranteed single vehicle upgrade at airport locations and a free weekend voucher

Complimentary Hertz Gold Plus Rewards® membership where you will receive up to 1% discount off standard rates; o one car class upgrade on rentals of five or more consecutive days (subject to availability); and a free additional driver.
Airport Lounge Access- Complimentary acc: What's more, you can each bring a guest at no cost into all American Express® and Priority Pass™ lounges when you travel.

productCategories.name: Borrow
productCategories.description: I need a loan to help me achieve my goals

productLines.name: PersonalLoan
productLines.description: School fees, unexpected bills, a holiday or home renovations? A personal loan can offer you the funds you need

products.name: Personal Loan
products.shortDescription: A personal loan is an easy and affordable way to better your life. Think about the good that a loan can do for you or your family, and you too can experience how a loan can pay you back.
salesHighlights: Loans available from R2 000 to R300 000*
Flexible repayment periods of 6 to 72 months.
Monthly repayments debited from your bank account.
The best possible interest rate that we can offer you.
Easy application process.
If your loan is approved, we will deposit the money directly into your bank account.

When you take out a personal loan, it is compulsory to have loan protection that will cover the outstanding loan amount should you unfortunately die, become disabled, are retrenched or unable to earn an income while you are still employed.  Our Personal Loan Credit Protection Plan will help pay off the outstanding amount of your personal loan if you cannot honour your repayments for any of these reasons. If you do not want to take out our Personal Loan Credit Protection Plan, you can take out an insurance policy with another insurer of your choice. This policy must offer the benefits that the Credit Life Insurance Regulations of 2017 require. Ask about our loan insurance when you apply for your loan.

productLines.name: HomeLoan
productLines.description: There's nothing quite like owning your own home.

products.name: Buy a Property
products.shortDescription: There's nothing quite like owning your own home. Nedbank's home loan products can help make this happen for you.

products.name: Request additional funds

products.shortDescription: There's nothing quite like owning your own home. Nedbank's home loan products can help make this happen for you.

productLines.name: StudentLoan
productLines.description: Specifically design for fulltime students and those entering further studies. Surety required

products.name: Student Loan
products.shortDescription: Dreaming of becoming a lawyer, doctor or designer? Whatever your career aspirations are, a Nedbank Student Loan can take you there.
salesHighlights: A great interest rate with flexible repayment options.
If I'm a fulltime student, or still busy with an internship or articles, my guarantor only pays back the interest on my loan.
To only start paying back my loan once my studies are complete.
Optional competitive credit life cover in the case of death or disablement.

productLines.name: Overdraft
productLines.description: Get an overdraft facility linked to your account to manage your monthly cash flow needs.

products.name: Overdraft
products.shortDescription: An overdraft is a flexible revolving credit facility linked to your current account that gives you access to extra money.
salesHighlights: An Overdraft is linked to the transactional account, and there is no need to open a separate account.
There is no need to transfer available funds between accounts, as the additional funds are linked to the transactional account.
The Overdraft is available whether it is utilised or not.
A fee for the service is charged whether it is utilised or not.
Interest is only charged on the portion of the overdraft utilised.
The limit increases a client's available balance, and there are no restrictions on the type of transactions clients can perform on their Overdraft facility, up to their credit limit.
Clients can either use the full limit granted or a portion thereof.
Competitive interest rates are offered compared to other lending products.
Optional Overdraft Assurance (Credit Life) provide clients with peace of mind in the event of death, disability and retrenchment.

productLines.name: CreditCards
productLines.description: Enjoy access to credit for daily and even larger purchases.

products.name: Nedbank Gold Credit Card (1032)
products.shortDescription: It is accepted at over 25 million stores in South Africa and internationally. If you are seeking to be rewarded for your everyday spend, choose to add Greenbacks Rewards to your credit card and support a worthy cause through our Affinities Programme at no cost to you.
products.extraInfoLine: Get a credit card that fits your pocket and gives you value, from a bank that you can trust.
salesHighlights: Option to link to the Greenbacks rewards programme
Complimentary card delivery through face-to-face or at a branch
Zero fees on card swipes
Mandatory automatic payment orders (APOs)
Up to 55 days interest-free credit
Complimentary transactional SMSes
Quick and easy contactless payment functionality
Manage your card with the Money app or Online Banking
Scan to pay using QR codes
Link your card to Apple Pay, Samsung Pay, Fitbit Pay or Garmin Pay
Flexible repayment options
Budget facility
Monthly eStatements

Rewards: Manage your money like never before and get rewarded for it. That's different. A money-management programme that gives you more than just points. The new Greenbacks is a money management programme that rewards you for making better money choices. Earn Greenbacks based on how you manage your money and get access to exclusive benefits. With Greenbacks you can take control of your money habits and turn them into achievable financial goals

Greenbacks Rewards is easy to understand and easy to use. Nedbank Greenbacks members earn Greenbacks on all eligible spend*. You earn unlimited Greenbacks 2X faster with the Greenbacks American Express® Credit Card and there are no expiration dates, caps or tiers.

You get to decide how you spend your rewards! Choose to Shop Invest or Donate your rewards. You can also spend your Greenbacks like cash with a FREE Nedbank Greenbacks SHOP Card, withdraw your Greenbacks as cash from any ATM or use your SHOP CARD internationally. The choice is entirely yours.
Affinities: Through the Greenbacks Rewards Program you can choose to support the development of the arts, the preservation and conservation of the environment, sports development or help orphaned and vulnerable children.
Green Affinity - Helping you support the environment at no cost to you
Children's Affinity - Helping the needy children of South Africa at no cost to you
Sport Affinity - Make sport development happen at no cost to you
Insurance: Optional travel insurance at a preferential premium
Balance Transfer: The balance transfer option enables you to transfer credit card debt held at another financial institution onto your Nedbank credit card helping you lower the cost of your credit card borrowings and consolidating multiple credit card debts.
You get a preferential interest rate 11.9% over 12 months meaning you save on interest and pay a lower instalment for the balance transfer period.
You can organise your finances by consolidating multiple monthly payments into one.
You can transfer an amount that’s within the credit limit on your new card.
If you choose to close your other credit cards you can also save on fees.

displayItems.displayName: What is a Tax Free investment?
data: A tax-free investment is one that allows you to invest up to R36 000 during the tax year and enjoy the proceeds tax-free.
Tax-free investments put you in control of your savings and encourage you to save while giving you the peace of mind that you can access your money easily.
Our tax-free unit trusts are Nedgroup Investments products, made available on the Nedbank Online banking. Nedgroup Investments is a subsidiary of Nedbank Group.

productCategories.name: Forex
productCategories.description: I am traveling or want to save in a foreign currency

products.name: Nedbank TravelCard
products.shortDescription: The Nedbank Travel Card is a prepaid card, enabling you to transact seamlessly without having to carry cash while you travel abroad. The card is accepted around the globe, and you can load up to eight international currencies with locked-in exchange rates. All ages can apply.
salesHighlights: You can load up to eight international currencies with locked-in exchange rates.

With the Nedbank app or Online Banking you can:|manage your currency;|transfer the money on your card into your transactional account;|block your lost or stolen card; and|freeze your misplaced card and unfreeze it once you have found it.
When you use your card, it will automatically use the currency of the country you are visiting.
You can also get a backup card for free.

productFeatures.name: CardFee
productFeatures.description: Card fee - R150 once-off for three years (currently free until 31 Dec 2018 if you purchase a card)

productFeatures.name: ReplacementCard
productFeatures.description: Replacement card - R150 once-off for three years

eligibilityRules.description: South African residents with a valid passport, travelling from South Africa by road, sea*, air* or rail* (* you will need to give proof of travel).
Foreign nationals with a valid study, work or spousal permit.

products.name: Foreign Bank notes
products.shortDescription: Foreign banknotes are cash notes in the currency of the country you are visiting.
salesHighlights: Security - Depending on the currency type, foreign banknotes have unique security features such as watermarks, foil threading, braille markings, holographic images and microprint.
Speed - Foreign banknotes allow you to pay for goods and services immediately.
Convenience - They are ideal for smaller purchases and expenses such as a cup of coffee, taxi fares and tipping porters and hotel staff.

productFeatures.name: Commission
productFeatures.displayName: Commission (Banknotes for countries in Common Monetary Area)
productFeatures.description: Commission (Banknotes for countries in Common Monetary Area) -3.25%

products.name: Credit Card
products.shortDescription: We offer a wide range of credit cards in South Africa that offer you the convenience of shopping in store or online.
salesHighlights: Security - Depending on the currency type, foreign banknotes have unique security features such as watermarks, foil threading, braille markings, holographic images and microprint.

Convenience - They are ideal for smaller purchases and expenses such as a cup of coffee, taxi fares and tipping porters and hotel staff.

productFeatures.description: Commission (Banknotes for countries in Common Monetary Area) -3.25%

products.name: Nedbank Foreign currency account
products.shortDescription: With a Nedbank Foreign Currency Account you can save for travelling, invest or hedge your currency in eight currencies without having to pay monthly fees.
salesHighlights: You need only R1 500 in any of the eight international currencies to open an Foreign currency account.
You can protect your investment against currency fluctuations without having to move money offshore.
You can transfer money in a foreign currency to an account at an overseas bank (depending on exchange control regulations).
You pay no monthly maintenance fees.
You can buy currency and later transfer it to your Nedbank Travel Card when you travel.
You can view your account balances and transaction history on the Nedbank Money app and Online Banking.

valueAddedServices: You can invest R1 million a year (single discretionary allowance) without needing a tax compliance status letter (also known as a tax clearance certificate) from the South African Revenue Services (SARS).
You can have up to R10 million a year extra in foreign investment, but you will need a tax compliance status  letter from SARS.
To deposit or withdraw money into or from your FCA, please send an email with your account number and the value of the transaction to FCA@nedbank.co.za.

productCategories.name: Protect
productCategories.description: Cover yourself, your loved ones or your assets.

products.name: Car insurance
products.shortDescription: Enjoy the freedom your wheels give you.
salesHighlights: We cover all kinds of vehicles, for example cars, trucks, vans, SUVs, 4x4s, motorcycles, boats, caravans, trailers, small watercraft and more.
You can choose from different solutions, ranging from comprehensive cover to third-party cover only.
We offer various car hire options to suit your needs and your pocket.
You can get extras like tyre-and-rim cover and extended warranties.
Home and roadside assistance services are available.
We also provide 4x4 off-road cover and cover for classis cars, which is quite hard to find.
It is quick and easy to apply.
salesHighlightsDetails: I need cover that suits my budget and my needs.
I want extras like an extended warranty or preowned-vehicle warranty.
products.salesHighlightsDetailsOption: Is vehicle insurance from Nedbank right for me?
valueAddedServices: tyre and rim insurance

products.name: Home contents insurance
products.shortDescription: Protect what you love to come home to.
salesHighlights: You can choose basic or comprehensive cover.
We cover food spoilage due to power outages and provide optional power surge cover for electrical items.
We cover alternative accommodation should your home become inhabitable due to an insured risk.
salesHighlightsDetails: Should I ever need to submit a claim, I want it to be quick and easy.
I want peace of mind knowing that my home content will be covered in the unfortunate event of a burglary or fire outbreak at home.
products.salesHighlightsDetailsOption: Is home contents insurance from Nedbank right for me?
valueAddedServices: tyre and rim insurance

products.name: Home Owner Insurance
products.shortDescription: Protect your home.
salesHighlights: We have preapproved suppliers who offer 24-hour services.
The amount you insure increases automatically to ensure your cover keeps up with rising building costs.
Personal-liability cover is included at no extra cost to you.
Cover for geysers and pipes is also included.
salesHighlightsDetails: I want affordable cover for when things go wrong, and I need to rebuild or repair my home.
products.salesHighlightsDetailsOption: Is homeowner's insurance from Nedbank right for me?
valueAddedServices: tyre and rim insurance

products.name: Bondability
products.shortDescription: Taking care of your home when you can't.
valueAddedServices: tyre and rim insurance

products.name: Bond Cover
products.shortDescription: Pay off your home loan should something happen to you.
valueAddedServices: tyre and rim insurance

products.name: Accident and health insurance
products.shortDescription: Ensure your quality of life, no matter what happens.
valueAddedServices: tyre and rim insurance

products.name: Travel insurance
products.shortDescription: Enjoy your time away from home knowing you’re covered.
salesHighlights: You qualify for automatic local and international travel insurance when you buy return travel tickets using your Nedbank credit or cheque card. And even if you don’t, you still have the option to take out travel insurance.
Nedbank travel insurance includes free 24-hour emergency assistance, no matter where in the world you are. And if you want extra protection, you can easily top up your cover to add:
medical emergency cover (three different options), which all include luggage delays or loss, missed travel connections and ticket upgrades; as well as
pre-existing medical conditions.

We offer cover for senior travellers between 75 and 89 years old, and if you’re a regular traveller between three months and 74 years old, you can get cover at discounted rates every time you travel. We can even help you with embassy letters.
salesHighlightsDetails: I want insurance when I buy return travel tickets using my Nedbank credit or cheque card, and the option to add extra insurance if I want to.
products.salesHighlightsDetailsOption: Is travel insurance from Nedbank right for me?
valueAddedServices: tyre and rim insurance

products.name: Disability insurance
products.shortDescription: Get a lump sum to pay debts and afford lifestyle adjustments should you become disabled, or functionally or physically impaired.
valueAddedServices: tyre and rim insurance

products.name: MyCover Life
products.shortDescription: Up to R2 million life cover no waiting period, so your loved ones are provided for financially when you pass away.
salesHighlights: Accident death cover of up to R 2 mission with up to 10 beneficiaries. No waiting period.
Funeral cover of up to R75, 000 for the main member, 1 spouse, 3 children and 4 parents.
Grocery benefit of up to R5,000 with no waiting period for accidental death and 6 month waiting period for natural death.
salesHighlightlist: Claims related to self-inflicted injury or suicide in the first 12 months of the policy.
We Will not pay claims as a result of war, acts of foreign enemy terrorism.
Critical illness in the first 12 months of your cover.
Insurance person participating in any dangerous pursuits.
salesHighlightsub: Legal services - Advice, consultation and drafting of legal documents
Trauma, assault and HIV - Up to R5 000 medical cover, trauma counselling up to R5 000 and HIV support up to R5 000
Personal health advisor - Counselling, medical advice, assessments and more.

products.name: Family Cover
products.shortDescription: Cover yourself and your family for R30 000 at a monthly premium of R90.~Funeral cover not only helps to manage costs during a difficult time, but also empowers family and community members to honour their loved ones with a dignified funeral. At Nedbank we understand how difficult grieving can be, and how important it is to be prepared for any unforeseen expenses.
salesHighlights: You can get cover for you and up to six family members.
You can benefit from immediate accidental death cover.
You, your immediate family and parents will be covered for natural death after only six months. Other insured lives will be covered after 12 months.
No medical tests are required to take out a funeral policy.
A premium bonus every 12 months which is equal to the average premiums paid in the preceding 11 months.
A no-lapse benefit. If you are experiencing financial difficulties and pay only part of your premium, your cover will be reduced but your policy will not lapse.
Access to our Value For Life programme.

salesHighlights: Cover for up to 29 family members.
You can choose from different cover amount options up to R100 000.
You can benefit from immediate accidental death cover.
You, your immediate family, parents and domestic worker(s) will be covered for natural death after only six months. Other insured lives will be covered after 12 months.
No medical tests are required to take out a funeral policy.
A premium bonus every 12 months which is equal to the average premiums paid in the preceding 11 months.
A no-lapse benefit. If you are experiencing financial difficulties and pay only part of your premium, your cover will be reduced but your policy will not lapse.

A family support benefit. Depending on the options you choose when you take out your policy, your beneficiaries could get a monthly income of up to R2 500 for three, six, nine or twelve months on your death.

A waiver of premium. Depending on the options you choose when you take out your policy, your premiums could be paid for up to 24 months, providing peace of mind that your loved ones will still be covered after your death.
Access to our Value For Life programme.
Get 5% discount on your premium for having your premium debited from your Nedbank account.
